column1: Funeral services will be held 11:30 a.m. Tuesday
column3: 2015 in the WARE FUNERAL HOME with Pastor Cliff Harbor officiating. Burial will follow in Londonderry Cemetery where military graveside rites will be conducted by the Ross County Veterans Honor Guard. Friends may call at the WARE FUNERAL HOME from 9:30 to 11:30 a.m. prior to the service on Tuesday.
